step1.monthlyBudget: How much do you want to spend net on your car every month?
step1.minMaxCannotBeSame: Minimum and Maximun ranges cannot be same*
step1.subText: Select the range of the minimum and maximum net amount you want to spend on your car per month. This takes into account the tax value, the tax addition percentage and the personal contribution.

step2.preferedFuel: Which fuel type do you prefer?
step2.minDriveRange: What is the minimal required range of your electrical car?

step3.preferedBody: Which body types do you prefer?

step4.gearbox: Which gear box do you want?

step5.enginePower: How important is the power of the engine?

step6.cargo: How much cargo do you need?

step7.minTowingCapacity: What is your desired minimum towing capacity?
step7.subTitle: If you don't require any towing capacity, leave it at 0 kg.

step8.minAmountSeats: What is the minimum amount of seats (including driver) you need?

step9.minAmountDoors: What is the minimum amount of doors you need?

leaseCategories.In Amount max 6 digits before decimal an: In amount max 6 digits before decimal and max 2 digits after decimal are allowed
leaseCategories.In OverRun max 6 digits before decimal a: In overrun max 6 digits before decimal and max 2 digits after decimal are allowed
leaseCategories.In Personal Contribution max 6 digits be: In personal contribution max 6 digits before decimal and max 2 digits after decimal are allowed
leaseCategories.In CO2 Emission max 6 digits before deci: In CO2 emission max 6 digits before decimal and max 1 digits after decimal are allowed
leaseCategories.Cannot delete because there are users sp: Cannot delete because there are users specified with this lease category!
leaseCategories.Undershoot payout percentage should cont: Undershoot payout percentage should contain number from 0 to 100
leaseCategories.Undershoot payout percentage must be a n: Undershoot payout percentage must be a number or left empty
leaseCategories.Max personal contribution percentage sho: Fixed contribution for private use as % of the total lease rate should be a number between 0 and 100
leaseCategories.Max personal contribution percentage mus: Fixed contribution for private use as % of the total lease rate must be a number or left empty
